Ben Hutton

  • Fri, Nov 05, 2021 - About 6 years ago I created a Perl library to allow @jsonschema implementations to easily use the official test suite. Today, I'm mering a PR to the JSON Schema website to list a new Perl implementation... and it uses this library! The code lives on!

  • Fri, Oct 29, 2021 - @mariadb @probablyrealrob We'd love to talk to you about using JSON Schema in MariaDB. Wouldn't it be nice to be able to validate more than just "it's valid JSON" using a schema? Want to join us (@jsonschema) and Oracle/MySQL in defining extensions to JSON Schema for databases?
